title: Agent Assigned to Already-Completed Ticket
issue: Dev agent was assigned to TKT-045, but this ticket was already completed and merged to main on 2025-12-08 (commit c9d3f01 and 33af288).

merge_commits: c9d3f01 - Merge TKT-045: Exclude dismissed surveys from PMF calculation - QA Passed

root_cause: Ticket tracking not updated after merge. Dispatcher assigned agent to ticket that was already completed.
human_actions_required: 1. Verify merge commits (c9d3f01, 33af288) contain correct implementation
2. Update ticket status in tickets.json to 'merged' or 'completed'
3. Clean up agent worktree for tkt-045 if it still exists
4. Investigate dispatcher logic - why was completed ticket assigned?
impact: Low - work was already done, just wasted 30min of agent time
questions_for_pm: Should we add a pre-flight check to prevent assignment of merged tickets?
Is there a ticket status field that should have been updated post-merge?
